page.title: 07Blackridge Parish Church
page.content: There is a{Sunday Service}in the {Church}every week and on another day of the week there is a short service. The church has a bell which rings every Sunday at 10am. In the{Boy's Brigade}you get games, information about the BB's and you sing songs. It is suitable for ages seven years - ten years. In the{Girls Brigade}you get the same as the Boy's Brigade only the age group is different. It is for ages five years to sixteen years. The {Sunday School}is for children aged between two years - twelve years. The{Youth fellowship}is for people aged between eleven years - sixteen years. The{coffee morning}is where people come for a cup of tea or coffee and a biscuit. There is a{jumble sale}there too and anyone is welcome.
